ticket.title: Cleanup "aaa_create_tables_test" hack
ticket.original-body:
Hey Peek [here's the patch I mentioned](https://gist.github.com/c9217ee8e153572a07f1) but forgot to send your way
The test file named "aaa_create_tables_test" is a hack and it makes testing a single file awkward since it always has to be included if we want the schema to be initialized (or reset).
